thread.title: Watch: Saunders' near-ace at the par-3 17th
thread.title_full: Watch: Saunders' near-ace at the par-3 17th

author: nbcsports.com
title: Watch: Saunders' near-ace at the par-3 17th
text:
RSS 
If there was ever a time and place for an ace ... 
Playing the par-3 17th hole at Bay Hill on Thursday, Arnold Palmer's grandson Sam Saunders very nearly made a hole-in-one from 221 yards when his ball came crashing down on the flagstick. "You must play boldly to win" - Arnold PalmerSam Saunders puts his grandfather's words in play pic.twitter.com/wTxnhEe1cw â€” Golf Channel (@GolfChannel) March 16, 2017 
Unfortunately, Saunders would miss the 10-foot putt for birdie and make a watery double bogey at the home hole for a round of 2-over 74. Article Tags: 
Contributions from writers and editors on the Golf Channel Digital team. Editor's Picks
